verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Now thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> wilt thou judge הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <WH8199> wilt thou judge אֶת־ <WH853> עִ֣יר <WH5892> Ai הַדָּמִ֑ים <WH1818> the bloody וְה֣וֹדַעְתָּ֔הּ <WH3045> acknowledge אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH8441> her all her abominations

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> Then say כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD עִ֣יר <WH5892> The city שֹׁפֶ֥כֶת <WH8210> sheddeth דָּ֛ם <WH1818> blood בְּתוֹכָ֖הּ <WH8432> in the midst לָב֣וֹא <WH935> may come עִתָּ֑הּ <WH6256> of it that her time וְעָשְׂתָ֧ה <WH6213> and maketh גִלּוּלִ֛ים <WH1544> idols עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> contrary לְטָמְאָֽה׃ <WH2930> against herself to defile

בְּדָמֵ֨ךְ <WH1818> in thy blood אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁפַ֜כְתְּ <WH8210> that thou hast shed אָשַׁ֗מְתְּ <WH816> Thou art become guilty וּבְגִלּוּלַ֤יִךְ <WH1544> thyself in thine idols אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂית֙ <WH6213> which thou hast made טָמֵ֔את <WH2930> and hast defiled וַתַּקְרִ֣יבִי <WH7126> to draw near יָמַ֔יִךְ <WH3117> and thou hast caused thy days וַתָּב֖וֹא <WH935> and art come עַד־ <WH5704> against שְׁנוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH8141> [even] unto thy years עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> have I נְתַתִּ֤יךְ <WH5414> therefore have I made חֶרְפָּה֙ <WH2781> thee a reproach לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> unto the heathen וְקַלָּסָ֖ה <WH7048> and a mocking לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> to all countries

הַקְּרֹב֛וֹת <WH7138> [Those that be] near וְהָרְחֹק֥וֹת <WH7350> and [those that be] far מִמֵּ֖ךְ <WH4480> at יִתְקַלְּסוּ־ <WH7046> from thee shall mock בָ֑ךְ טְמֵאַ֣ת <WH2931> of ill הַשֵּׁ֔ם <WH8034> repute רַבַּ֖ת <WH7227> [and] much הַמְּהוּמָֽה׃ <WH4103> vexed

הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> Behold the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לִזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> were in thee to their power הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> have been בָ֑ךְ לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> the purpose שְׁפָךְ־ <WH8210> to shed דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> blood

אָ֤ב <WH1> by father וָאֵם֙ <WH517> and mother הֵקַ֣לּוּ <WH7043> In thee have they set light בָ֔ךְ לַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> with the stranger עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> of thee have they dealt בַעֹ֖שֶׁק <WH6233> by oppression בְּתוֹכֵ֑ךְ <WH8432> in the midst יָת֥וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> and the widow ה֥וֹנוּ <WH3238> in thee have they vexed בָֽךְ׃
קָדָשַׁ֖י <WH6944> mine holy things בָּזִ֑ית <WH959> Thou hast despised וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths חִלָּֽלְתְּ׃ <WH2490> and hast profaned

אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> In thee are men רָכִ֛יל <WH7400> that carry tales הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> have been בָ֖ךְ לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the purpose שְׁפָךְ־ <WH8210> to shed דָּ֑ם <WH1818> blood וְאֶל־ <WH413> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> upon the mountains אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> and in thee they eat בָ֔ךְ זִמָּ֖ה <WH2154> lewdness עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> of thee they commit בְתוֹכֵֽךְ׃ <WH8432> in the midst

עֶרְוַת־ <WH6172> nakedness אָ֖ב <WH1> their fathers' גִּלָּה־ <WH1540> In thee have they discovered בָ֑ךְ טְמֵאַ֥ת <WH2931> for pollution הַנִּדָּ֖ה <WH5079> her that was set apart עִנּוּ־ <WH6031> in thee have they humbled בָֽךְ׃

וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> And one אֶת־ <WH854> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> with his neighbour's עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> hath committed תּֽוֹעֵבָ֔ה <WH8441> abomination וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and another אֶת־ <WH853> כַּלָּת֖וֹ <WH3618> his daughter in law טִמֵּ֣א <WH2930> defiled בְזִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> hath lewdly וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and another אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֹת֥וֹ <WH269> his sister בַת־ <WH1323> daughter אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father's עִנָּה־ <WH6031> in thee hath humbled בָֽךְ׃

שֹׁ֥חַד <WH7810> gifts לָֽקְחוּ־ <WH3947> In thee have they taken בָ֖ךְ לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of שְׁפָךְ־ <WH8210> to shed דָּ֑ם <WH1818> blood נֶ֧שֶׁךְ <WH5392> usury וְתַרְבִּ֣ית <WH8636> and increase לָקַ֗חַתְּ <WH3947> thou hast taken וַתְּבַצְּעִ֤י <WH1214> and thou hast greedily gained רֵעַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7453> of thy neighbours בַּעֹ֔שֶׁק <WH6233> by extortion וְאֹתִ֣י <WH853> שָׁכַ֔חַתְּ <WH7911> and hast forgotten נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold הִכֵּ֣יתִי <WH5221> Behold therefore I have smitten כַפִּ֔י <WH3709> mine hand אֶל־ <WH413> at בִּצְעֵ֖ךְ <WH1215> at thy dishonest gain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֑ית <WH6213> which thou hast made וְעַ֨ל־ <WH5921> and at דָּמֵ֔ךְ <WH1818> and at thy blood אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּתוֹכֵֽךְ׃ <WH8432> which hath been in the midst

הֲיַעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> endure לִבֵּךְ֙ <WH3820> Can thine heart אִם־ <WH518> or תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <WH2388> be strong יָדַ֔יִךְ <WH3027> or can thine hands לַיָּמִ֕ים <WH3117> in the days אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> that I shall deal אוֹתָ֑ךְ <WH854> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> with thee? I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> have spoken וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <WH6213> [it] and will do

וַהֲפִיצוֹתִ֤י <WH6327> And I will scatter אוֹתָךְ֙ <WH853> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> thee among the heathen וְזֵרִיתִ֖יךְ <WH2219> and disperse בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> thee in the countries וַהֲתִמֹּתִ֥י <WH8552> and will consume טֻמְאָתֵ֖ךְ <WH2932> thy filthiness מִמֵּֽךְ׃ <WH4480> at

וְנִחַ֥לְתְּ <WH2490> will profane בָּ֖ךְ לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in thyself in the sight גוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <WH3045> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הָיוּ־ <WH1961> has become לִ֥י בֵֽית־ <WH1004> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel [לְסוּג כ] (לְסִ֑יג <WH5509> dross ק) כֻּלָּ֡ם <WH3605> all נְ֠חֹשֶׁת <WH5178> all they [are] brass וּבְדִ֨יל <WH913> and tin וּבַרְזֶ֤ל <WH1270> and iron וְעוֹפֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH5777> and lead בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst כּ֔וּר <WH3564> of the furnace סִגִ֥ים <WH5509> is to me become dross כֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> of silver הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> has become ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Because הֱי֥וֹת <WH1961> have become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <WH3605> all לְסִגִ֑ים <WH5509> Because ye are all become dross לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> therefore הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am going קֹבֵ֣ץ <WH6908> behold therefore I will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> you into the midst יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

קְבֻ֣צַת <WH6910> [As] they gather כֶּ֡סֶף <WH3701> silver וּ֠נְחֹשֶׁת <WH5178> and brass וּבַרְזֶ֨ל <WH1270> and iron וְעוֹפֶ֤רֶת <WH5777> and lead וּבְדִיל֙ <WH913> and tin אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> into the midst כּ֔וּר <WH3564> of the furnace לָפַֽחַת־ <WH5301> to blow עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> the fire לְהַנְתִּ֑יךְ <WH5413> upon it to melt כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> so אֶקְבֹּץ֙ <WH6908> [it] so will I gather בְּאַפִּ֣י <WH639> [you] in mine anger וּבַחֲמָתִ֔י <WH2534> and in my fury וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <WH3240> and I will leave וְהִתַּכְתִּ֖י <WH5413> [you there] and melt אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְכִנַּסְתִּ֣י <WH3664> Yea I will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְנָפַחְתִּ֥י <WH5301> you and blow עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> on בְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> upon you in the fire עֶבְרָתִ֑י <WH5678> of my wrath וְנִתַּכְתֶּ֖ם <WH5413> and ye shall be melted בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> in the midst

כְּהִתּ֥וּךְ <WH2046> is melted כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> As silver בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst כּ֔וּר <WH3564> of the furnace כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so תֻּתְּכ֣וּ <WH5413> so shall ye be melted בְתוֹכָ֑הּ <WH8432> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> thereof and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I the LORD שָׁפַ֥כְתִּי <WH8210> have poured out חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> my fury עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֱמָר־ <WH559> say לָ֕הּ אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> unto her Thou [art] the land לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not מְטֹהָרָ֖ה <WH2891> that is not cleansed הִ֑יא <WH1931> he לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor גֻשְׁמָ֖הּ <WH1656> nor rained בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> upon in the day זָֽעַם׃ <WH2195> of indignation

קֶ֤שֶׁר <WH7195> [There is] a conspiracy נְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5030> of her prophets בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> in the midst כַּאֲרִ֥י <WH738> lion שׁוֹאֵ֖ג <WH7580> thereof like a roaring טֹ֣רֵֽף <WH2963> ravening טָ֑רֶף <WH2964> the prey נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> souls אָכָ֗לוּ <WH398> they have devoured חֹ֤סֶן <WH2633> the treasure וִיקָר֙ <WH3366> and precious things יִקָּ֔חוּ <WH3947> they have taken אַלְמְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH490> widows הִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> they have made her many בְתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> in the midst

כֹּהֲנֶ֜יהָ <WH3548> Her priests חָמְס֣וּ <WH2554> have violated תוֹרָתִי֮ <WH8451> my law וַיְחַלְּל֣וּ <WH2490> and have profaned קָדָשַׁי֒ <WH6944> mine holy things בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> between the holy לְחֹל֙ <WH2455> and profane לֹ֣א <WH3808> no הִבְדִּ֔ילוּ <WH914> they have put no difference וּבֵין־ <WH996> between הַטָּמֵ֥א <WH2931> [difference] between the unclean לְטָה֖וֹר <WH2889> and the clean לֹ֣א <WH3808> no הוֹדִ֑יעוּ <WH3045> neither have they shewed וּמִשַׁבְּתוֹתַי֙ <WH7676> from my sabbaths הֶעְלִ֣ימוּ <WH5956> and have hid עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> their eyes וָאֵחַ֖ל <WH2490> and I am profaned בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

שָׂרֶ֣יהָ <WH8269> Her princes בְקִרְבָּ֔הּ <WH7130> in the midst כִּזְאֵבִ֖ים <WH2061> thereof [are] like wolves טֹ֣רְפֵי <WH2963> ravening טָ֑רֶף <WH2964> the prey לִשְׁפָּךְ־ <WH8210> to shed דָּם֙ <WH1818> blood לְאַבֵּ֣ד <WH6> [and] to destroy נְפָשׁ֔וֹת <WH5315> souls לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> order בְּצֹ֥עַ <WH1214> to get בָּֽצַע׃ <WH1215> dishonest gain

וּנְבִיאֶ֗יהָ <WH5030> And her prophets טָח֤וּ <WH2902> have daubed לָהֶם֙ תָּפֵ֔ל <WH8602> them with untempered חֹזִ֣ים <WH2374> [morter] seeing שָׁ֔וְא <WH7723> vanity וְקֹסְמִ֥ים <WH7080> and divining לָהֶ֖ם כָּזָ֑ב <WH3577> lies אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> unto them saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> when the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not דִבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath not spoken

עַ֤ם <WH5971> The people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> of the land עָ֣שְׁקוּ <WH6231> yea they have oppressed עֹ֔שֶׁק <WH6233> oppression וְגָזְל֖וּ <WH1497> and exercised גָּזֵ֑ל <WH1498> robbery וְעָנִ֤י <WH6041> the poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֙ <WH34> and needy הוֹנ֔וּ <WH3238> and have vexed וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגֵּ֥ר <WH1616> the stranger עָשְׁק֖וּ <WH6231> oppressed בְּלֹ֥א <WH3808> without מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> wrongfully

וָאֲבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> And I sought מֵהֶ֡ם <WH1992> for אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> for a man גֹּֽדֵר־ <WH1443> among them that should make up גָּדֵר֩ <WH1447> the hedge וְעֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> and stand בַּפֶּ֧רֶץ <WH6556> in the gap לְפָנַ֛י <WH6440> before בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> me for the land לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> so שַׁחֲתָ֑הּ <WH7843> that I should not destroy וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> no מָצָֽאתִי׃ <WH4672> it but I found

וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <WH8210> Therefore have I poured out עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> out זַעְמִ֔י <WH2195> mine indignation בְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> them with the fire עֶבְרָתִ֖י <WH5678> of my wrath כִּלִּיתִ֑ים <WH3615> upon them I have consumed דַּרְכָּם֙ <WH1870> their own way בְּרֹאשָׁ֣ם <WH7218> upon their heads נָתַ֔תִּי <WH5414> have I recompensed נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
